critique: This document is an executive order that amends a previous executive order (13037) related to the Commission to Study Capital Budgeting. The changes involve increasing the potential membership of the commission and removing a deadline. Given the subject matter and the nature of the changes, the document appears to be largely neutral regarding the specified axes. There's no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, executive power shift, federalism implications, security vs. liberty concerns, economic regulation changes, or social inclusion aspects. The changes seem administrative in nature.
